description: Types of bank accounts (e.g., savings, checking).

columns.name: account_type_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the account type.

columns.name: account_type
columns.description: Name of the account type (e.g., savings, checking).

description: Types of loans offered by the bank.

columns.name: loan_type_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the loan type.

columns.name: loan_type
columns.description: Name of the loan type (e.g., home, auto, personal).

columns.name: city
columns.description: City where the branch is located.

columns.name: state
columns.description: State where the branch is located.

columns.name: open_date
columns.description: Date when the branch was opened.

description: Bank customers (people, clients, account holders) and their personal information.

columns.name: customer_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the customer (person, client, account holder).

columns.name: first_name
columns.description: Customer's first name (person's first name, client's first name).

columns.name: last_name
columns.description: Customer's last name (person's last name, client's last name).

columns.name: email
columns.description: Customer's email address (person's email, client's email).

columns.name: phone
columns.description: Customer's phone number (contact number, mobile, telephone, person's phone, client's phone).

columns.name: dob
columns.description: Customer's date of birth (person's date of birth, client's date of birth).

columns.name: region
columns.description: Region where the customer (person, client) resides.

columns.name: role
columns.description: Employee's role at the bank (e.g., manager, teller).

columns.name: branch_id
columns.description: Branch where the account is held.

columns.name: open_date
columns.description: Date when the account was opened.

columns.name: txn_type
columns.description: Type of transaction (e.g., deposit, withdrawal, transfer).

columns.name: description
columns.description: Description or note for the transaction.

columns.name: loan_id
columns.description: Loan for which the payment was made.

columns.name: card_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the credit card.

columns.name: card_type
columns.description: Type of the credit card (e.g., Visa, MasterCard).

columns.name: issue_date
columns.description: Date when the card was issued.

columns.name: card_txn_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the card transaction.

columns.name: card_id
columns.description: Credit card used for the transaction.

columns.name: category
columns.description: Category of the transaction (e.g., groceries, travel).

columns.name: account_id
columns.description: Account from which the withdrawal was made.
